alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Garden; Grant; Hooker; Sheridan; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 10 at 1:46PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central, panhandle and west central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday afternoon through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Garden; Grant; Hooker; Sheridan; Western Cherry
